name: MONSTER MAYOR
description:
A murder attempt failed. You survived, but changed.

MONSTER MAYOR is the story of Vincent Imperati, the mayor of Forest Peak. An incident one week ago left him with a illness that resulted in a fugue state from which he has just recently recovered. Or so he thought. Now Mayor Imperati is dealing with the bizarre aftereffects of his illness while running a town full of complicated characters. Can he manage the balance of work, home and transformation? Most importantly, can he  figure out who is trying to kill him before they succeed?

A game jam project made for Spooktoberfest! The writing is 100% completed, but please be patient with the code implementation. Unless you're okay with the true kinetic text experience. ;)

EDIT: MAJOR BUG FIXED! Should be able to experience the full story now! Many thanks for your patience!
